name: Taloflow
headline: Better, faster tech vendor research
description:
Choosing the right tool for your tech stack is a soul-sucking exercise — countless hours in demos, endless spreadsheets, and the risk of a wrong choice. At Taloflow, our mission is to make technology selection effortless and low-risk for IT and software teams.

Taloflow is backed by Y Combinator, YC Continuity, Wonder Ventures, Plug and Play Ventures, and Voyager Capital.

founders.name: Louis-Victor Jadavji, Founder
founders.description: I'm "LV". I'm the co-founder/CEO of Taloflow.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/662874748f18d59e4538020a_CVS_Health_Logo.png)![Nvidia logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/65259278fbb47fb7bb18dec3_nvidia-wordmark-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6628714509cbf9928b363ad3_Broadcom_Ltd_Logo.png)![Logo for Coupa](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640acf8943138c58131aa716_Coupa_Logo_4color.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/662871355019ea5e58d7fa18_2560px-BNP_Paribas_logo.png)![Modusbox logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/5ffea93f417a3e06617fe268_modusbox.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/662873d800c02c677ea134f5_Samsung_wordmark.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/65c9a28e98250972e9fa82d8_1280px-Nerdwallet_Horizontal_Logo.svg.png)
to make decisions in dozens of categories, including

Get clarity in minutes
## Get expert insights on technology vendors tailored to your use case
![Lightbulb icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6409b2e503aed70da53e91e7_tips_and_updates.svg)
### Tailor insights to your specific use case.
Within minutes, you'll have a matrix of vendor pros and cons, a shortlist of vendors, and an objective analysis as to who wins and why.
![Screenshot of the Taloflow user interface for answering questions about a use case for vendor evaluations](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640a3a22767ae7219cdabb4f_questions.png)
![Screenshot of Taloflow product showcasing data tables for analyzing vendor capabilities](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640a27122066db3a537756a3_data_tables.png)
![Find in page icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6409b2e526e7bf7d88d1d479_find_in_page.svg)
### Research faster with built-in vendor data.
No more Excel sheets. No more "gotchas". Tap into 10s of thousands of vendor data points curated by top analysts with experience at firms like Gartner.
![An icon comprised of three circles stacked in a pyramid](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6409b2e54c88432d80e68359_workspaces.svg)
### Collaborate and drive accountability.
Asynchronously build consensus on requirements between leaders and contributors in product and engineering.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6174108dd501680a15c65008_Purple_Checkbox.svg)
Present standardized docs to senior leadership for comment
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6174108dd501680a15c65008_Purple_Checkbox.svg)
Build internal consensus on requirements and use case fit
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6174108dd501680a15c65008_Purple_Checkbox.svg)
Create context-rich spikes in your favorite issue tracking tools
Coming Soon
![Asana logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640a34314e1196658628309e_asana-logos-idXp3_6g45.svg)![Linear logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640a3450867048a80944ab9f_linear-logos-idOReMseAv.png)![Logo for Atlassian Jira](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640a345bb51be312e4f791c6_jira-with-text.svg)
![Checkmark icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6409b2e412b4fecb70c36fb8_library.svg)
### Get docs compatible with your existing approval processes.
Taloflow will facilitate custom reports, presentations and exports to external notebooks, spreadsheets, PPTX, PDF, and much more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6174108dd501680a15c65008_Purple_Checkbox.svg)
Handoff to CLM and TPRM tools seamlessly
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6174108dd501680a15c65008_Purple_Checkbox.svg)
Get financial analysis including NPV, ROI and TCO
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6174108dd501680a15c65008_Purple_Checkbox.svg)
Get organized, detailed and clear presentations for leadership

Built for decision-makers
## The ultimate productivity tool for people who pick tools.
### Make faster decisions
"Taloflow allows me to get unique insights about our use case without having to spend much time or effort going through spreadsheets."
![Modusbox logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/640a3eca6a03832bcd5de8de_ModusBox-logo-white-background.webp)
Patrick Lewis
IT Manager at ModusBox
### De-risk your decisions
"Taloflow's buying insights allow us to find and compare products in verticals like cloud cost management and storage with technical rigor."
![NS1 logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/60f66add0caf465d1259351f_NS1.png)
David Wilson
CFO at NS1
### Avoid demo calls
“Taloflow helps us precisely define our use case and compare options. And, for bonus points, I get to avoid soul-sucking demo calls with vendors.”
![Style Arcade logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/61796a6189316457e9efdf16_quepn1gbv1xc86udcoqx.png)
Brent Maxwell
CTO at Style Arcade
### Get detailed analysis
"Taloflow has an ability to not just present data, but to interpret it in a way that is highly relevant. The detailed analysis got us to a very informed decision."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/665fbdcc7fd3ca49ebb972e1_images.png)
Stuart Cochrane
Head of IT at CCC
### Enhance key decisions
"Great product! Your team has brought clarity, delight, and transparency to a difficult to understand process. It helps a ton that you are experts in this domain."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/666d38665ed4f2d4acbdfe14_Google__G__logo.svg)
Enger Bewza
Product at Google
### Collaborate effectively
"Taloflow delivers accurate insights on tech vendors quickly. Its export options (Excel/PDF), paired with clear explanations for each rating, make it highly effective for collaborative decisions."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5c553e9fc3ddd3400fe58821/6780107c0f4c09cc8f508bbc_anydesk-svgrepo-com.svg)
Marco De Guglielmo
System Architect at AnyDesk
## Confidently make your decision
Get a transparent management-ready report tailored to your **unique use case and requirements** with the help of top application and infrastructure experts.
[Get my free report](https://www.taloflow.ai/<https:/use.taloflow.ai/signup>)
Get important insights in your inbox
Join our monthly newsletter for the latest on cloud vendor selection.
Thank you! We'll add you to the list!

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Taloflow**

**Website:** [Taloflow.ai](https://www.taloflow.ai)  
**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** Santa Monica, CA  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Backers:** Y Combinator, YC Continuity, Wonder Ventures, Plug and Play Ventures, Voyager Capital  
**Batch:** Y Combinator Batch W21  
**Categories:** Developer tools, SaaS

---

### Mission
At Taloflow, the mission is clear: to streamline and simplify technology vendor research. This is about making what is usually a tedious process into something that is almost effortless and low-risk for IT and software teams. 

### The Problem
Anyone who's been in charge of building a tech stack knows the drill – endless spreadsheets, countless demos, and the anxiety of making the wrong choice. Taloflow exists to cut through that noise and offer clarity.

### What Taloflow Does
Instead of relying on traditional vendor evaluations that can take months, Taloflow uses advanced AI technology and industry expertise to provide timely, tailored insights. This means that organizations can say goodbye to the “soul-sucking” experience of vendor evaluations and make decisions based on data-driven insights within as little as a week.

- **Vendor Data:** With over 100,000 fresh data points, Taloflow equips users with necessary insights for evaluating solutions across categories such as cloud DBMS, API Gateway, RPA, and more.
- **Collaboration Tools:** Built for teamwork, it allows asynchronous coordination among leaders and contributors in product and engineering. 
- **Custom Reports:** Taloflow offers documentation that seamlessly integrates with existing company processes, ensuring financial analyses are at the user's fingertips.

### Why Choose Taloflow?
- **Expert Insights:** Tailored analysis based on specific use cases allows teams to quickly identify the best vendor options.
- **Avoid Demos:** Users can define their use cases and compare options without the burden of lengthy demo calls.
-**Trusted by Leaders:** Taloflow has garnered respect from IT and digital transformation leaders at tech companies and enterprise giants like Nvidia, Google, and Coupa.

### Conclusion
If you're tired of wading through the swamp of tech vendor research, Taloflow is poised to be your guide. It's a tool for decision-makers seeking clarity, efficiency, and a faster path to the right technology solutions.
